card_pen_effect: You can activate 1 of these effects;$N●Special Summon this card to your Main Monster Zone in its same column.$N●Move 1 monster in your Main Monster Zone to an adjacent (horizontal) Monster Zone.$NYou can only use this effect of "Arktos XII - Chronochasm Vaylantz" once per turn.
card_text: 2 Level 5 or higher "Vaylantz" monsters$NMust first be Special Summoned (from your face-down Extra Deck) by Tributing the above cards. (Quick Effect): You can switch the locations of 2 monsters in your Main Monster Zones or 2 monsters in your opponent's Main Monster Zones. If a card in the Monster Zone moves to another Monster Zone (except during the Damage Step): You can destroy 1 card on the field. You can only use each effect of "Arktos XII - Chronochasm Vaylantz" once per turn.
